title: Smartphone-Based Mathematical Project Learning: Strengthening Practical Application Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Solving math problems and conducting field projects using smartphones in PC-unavailable environments, emphasizing collaboration and on-site task resolution

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement mathematical modeling projects using smartphone apps.
Learners can analyze data collected in mobile environments to derive mathematically sound conclusions applicable to real-world tasks.
Learners can communicate with team members using smartphone-based collaboration tools to complete project deliverables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
